mapper.sql: SOURCE_FLOW, SCHEME_FLOW, SCHEME_NAME, PROJ_FIRST_SOURCE_ID, PROJ_FIRST_SOURCE_NAME, PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_ID, PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_NAME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PDSCI.SRM_PROJ_SOURCE_SCHEME
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PDSCI.SRM_PROJ_SOURCE_SCHEME (SOURCE_FLOW, SCHEME_FLOW, SCHEME_NAME, PROJ_FIRST_SOURCE_ID, PROJ_FIRST_SOURCE_NAME, PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_ID, PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_NAME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW) values (#{sourceFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schemeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schemeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projFirstSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projFirstSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projSecondSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projSecondSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SOURCE_FLOW,

mapper.update:
update PDSCI.SRM_PROJ_SOURCE_SCHEME
SOURCE_FLOW = #{record.sourceFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHEME_FLOW = #{record.schemeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHEME_NAME = #{record.schemeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_FIRST_SOURCE_ID = #{record.projFirstSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_FIRST_SOURCE_NAME = #{record.projFirstSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_ID = #{record.projSecondSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_NAME = #{record.projSecondSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORD_STATUS = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_FLOW = #{record.createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{record.modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update PDSCI.SRM_PROJ_SOURCE_SCHEME set SOURCE_FLOW = #{record.sourceFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHEME_FLOW = #{record.schemeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHEME_NAME = #{record.schemeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJ_FIRST_SOURCE_ID = #{record.projFirstSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJ_FIRST_SOURCE_NAME = #{record.projFirstSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_ID = #{record.projSecondSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_NAME = #{record.projSecondSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECORD_STATUS = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_FLOW = #{record.createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{record.modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PDSCI.SRM_PROJ_SOURCE_SCHEME
SCHEME_FLOW = #{schemeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHEME_NAME = #{schemeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_FIRST_SOURCE_ID = #{projFirstSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_FIRST_SOURCE_NAME = #{projFirstSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_ID = #{projSecondSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_NAME = #{projSecondSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_FLOW = #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SOURCE_FLOW = #{sourceFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update PDSCI.SRM_PROJ_SOURCE_SCHEME set SCHEME_FLOW = #{schemeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHEME_NAME = #{schemeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJ_FIRST_SOURCE_ID = #{projFirstSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJ_FIRST_SOURCE_NAME = #{projFirstSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_ID = #{projSecondSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_NAME = #{projSecondSourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_FLOW = #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SOURCE_FLOW = #{sourceFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
